issues.message: This path concatenation which depends on [library input](1) is later used in a [shell command](2).

rule.name: js/shell-command-constructed-from-input
rule.short_description: Unsafe shell command constructed from library input
rule.full_description: Using externally controlled strings in a command line may allow a malicious user to change the meaning of the command.

rule.name: js/shell-command-injection-from-environment
rule.short_description: Shell command built from environment values
rule.full_description: Building a shell command string with values from the enclosing environment may cause subtle bugs or vulnerabilities.
